newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Myriad Genetics Inc.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Myriad Genetics Inc.

text.p: --Montgomery Securities analyst David Crossen said he initiated coverage of Myriad Genetics with a buy rating.

--Crossen estimates the company will lose $0.65 per share in fiscal 1997 ending in June, and earn $1.14 per share in fiscal 1998. His target price for the stock is $41, about 53 percent above current levels.
--Crosson said his buy rating was based on the expectation Myriad would enter at least two additional partnershps in the next year that will "allow an upward revaluation" in its genomics business.

--He also cited its scheduled launch this October of a test to detect mutatins in two genes which put women at significant risk of developing breast or ovarian cancer. He said test revenues are estimated to be $12 million in the first year of the launch, rising to $125 million by 2000.
